CSAB3.SA.long_name: Companhia de Seguros Alianca da Bahia
CSAB3.SA.summary: Companhia de Seguros Alianca da Bahia operates as an insurance company in Brazil and Uruguay. The company individual personal accident, residential, legal person, group life, condo and business, operational risk, and named insurance products. Companhia de Seguros Alianca da Bahia was founded in 1870 and is based in Salvador, Brazil.

SULA11.SA.summary: Sul AmÃ©rica S.A., through its subsidiaries, engages in the insurance business in Brazil. The company's products and services include health and dental insurance, health and dental administrative services, healthcare and well-being solutions, life insurance and private pension, savings bonds, and asset management. It also offers property and casualty insurance products, including automobile, mass, and mortgage; and individual and group life, and accident insurance products. The company offers its products and services through a network of independent brokers. Sul AmÃ©rica S.A. was founded in 1895 and is headquartered in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.
